section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Chiropractor" has the meaning stated in § 3-101 of the Health Occupations Article.
"License" has the meaning stated in § 3-101 of the Health Occupations Article.
"Licensed chiropractor" has the meaning stated in § 3-101 of the Health Occupations Article.

text.section:
A licensed chiropractor is not civilly liable for reviewing the fees or charges for services of another licensed chiropractor in this or any other state if:
The records are received by the chiropractor from an insurance company solely for the purpose of evaluating whether excessive treatment or service was furnished; and
The chiropractor acts:
In good faith; and
Within the scope of the chiropractor's license.
